content: a beginner friendly guide to knitting a stardrop from stardew valley this pattern is worked in the flat with decreases/increases only on knit row then seamed together images are also included for steps in construction skill level beginner/intermediate if there s anything i can add to this pattern to make it more beginner friendly please let me know all the stitches this pattern asks for with links to tutorials for anything specified - knit - purl - kfb increase - m1l/krl increase - ssk decrease - k2t decrease - drawstring castoff what you need for this project purple yarn main body green yarn leaves straight knitting needles a sewing/darning needle
